headline: Coinbase, Circle rally as stablecoin momentum heats up
summary: Coinbase and Circle have emerged as major highfliers as momentum surrounding the stablecoin industry soars.

raw.headline: Coinbase, Circle rally as stablecoin momentum heats up
raw.summary: Coinbase and Circle have emerged as major highfliers as momentum surrounding the stablecoin industry soars.

headline: Mastercard expands partnership with Fiserv to integrate FIUSD stablecoin
summary: The partnership aims to address the practical use cases and challenges associated with the adoption of stablecoins.

raw.headline: Mastercard expands partnership with Fiserv to integrate FIUSD stablecoin
raw.summary: The partnership aims to address the practical use cases and challenges associated with the adoption of stablecoins.

headline: Xero to acquire B2B payments platform Melio in $2.5bn deal
summary: Melio, founded in 2018 and headquartered in New York with offices in Tel Aviv, Israel, serves over 80,000 US SMBs and accounting firms.

raw.headline: Xero to acquire B2B payments platform Melio in $2.5bn deal
raw.summary: Melio, founded in 2018 and headquartered in New York with offices in Tel Aviv, Israel, serves over 80,000 US SMBs and accounting firms.

headline: Fiserv
summary: Unless your life is cash-only, Fiserv is likely helping move your money in some way. “We touch probably 100% of U.S. households,” says Neil H....
